item.title: About me
item.description: You came here to get to know the person behind this blog. Except that I’m nobody and don’t intend to be anybody in particular. I just share some ideas with you freely. I like absolute, unadulterated freedom. A fervent defender of OpenSource. I like to work with open source technologies while contributing to them. I wish you an excellent reading. If you have any questions, I invite you to send me a message on twitter : https://twitter.
